ImgBurn is the program to use!

Are some DL discs different sizes than others?  This is the first time I've seen this message with ImgBurn:

Image Size:  4,267,015 Sectors (8,334 MB)
Disc Size:     4,173,824 Sectors (8,152 MB)
...

I will try to overburn but I suspect the game will work but crash eventually.

The ZRY copy is 0.02 GB smaller and there are more seeds for that one now.

@steelllynx all dual layer discs are 8.5gig you should not use overburn method in imgburn for these XGD3 games u should use  truncate method if using the newer imgburn and standard dvdburner or even better get urself the dvd burner and custom firmware of c4eva to enable u 2 burn 100% of the game have you ever burned 1 of these XGD3 games??? because u will require lt+2.0 2 b able 2 play this.

I thought if you used truncate that the hashchecks would be in the wrong place and it would cause a flag.. 

I might be wrong of course, seem that aint nobody sure about burning, unless its with the new IHAS drives and custom firmware.

I also though this was why Forza 4 eventually gave you the "unauthorized disc" warning no matter which way you did it, because those checks are on the "extra" space created via the XGD3 format

@Zenman1976.. all ov my XGD3 games have been burned using the old imgburn where you get the 4 error msgs NOT the truncate option and not using ihas dvd burner or verbs aone and mirror discs all play perfect i have completed forza4 and bf3 and driversf all the way to the credits and i have had no fails at all....so it seems sum people do know how to burn them with no probs just follow instructions 2 burn that was included in the first releases of XGD3 games and ur fine.

I burned with iHas324 but I forgot to check OPC at 4x burning.  Trying 2.4 now.  Anyway, I put the disc that didn't verify in the 360 and it wanted to apply the update (I flashed LT+ 2.0 earlier today) and verified with Final Fantasy XIII (it still worked) so now I'm trying to figure out how to update the dashboard without it reflashing my drive.
I burned at 2.4x without OPC and still get verify failed at 49%.  I'm using Memorex DL discs but never had problems with them before.  I'm going to keep trying.
It read the disc, applied the update, but then it just says Unrecognized Disc when I try to play.  Other games still work so I know it didn't reflash my drive.

always fails verify at sector 2112480
disc has Last Physical Sector in Layer 0: 2,283,519
This should be working.  I will try my iHas124 next and see if it has the same problem
for anyone having slow speeds, i used xbox360iso.com to get the game and I was CONSTANTLY getting 1MB/Sec i don't use torrents anymore i use that site.
I bought some Verbatim DVD+R DL (in jewel case) and this works now.  I'll save my Memorex discs for games that are not XGD3.
